page.title: 07BADDESLEY CLINTON:A NUNS DAY
page.content: {5.00}Rise.{5.30}First Office,then prayer and meditation.{7 00}Worship and prayer for the needs of the world. {7.30}Breakfast-tea or coffee and bread {7.40}Office of Tierce(short hymn,three psalms,reading,silence and collect). {9.00}Mass of the Eucharist,followed by a meeting in the Chapter Room to discuss that day's work.Then the nuns go to different jobs (gardening,in the vestment room or the infirmary). {12.30}Private prayer.{12.45}Office of Sexte.{1.00}Lunch - fish, cheese or eggs,eaten in the refectory. Then work again,and a cup of tea.{3.40}Office of Nones,then reading and hobbies, such as spinning or flower-pressing. {5.20}Vespers and meditation.{ {6.30}Recreation.{7.30}Supper. {8.00}Compline.They retire to their cells about{8.30}but can rise during the night for private prayer.
